scripts.build: rm fix-space-karen-*.zip; zip -9 -r fix-space-karen-$(grep '"version"' manifest.json | awk -F: '{print $2}' | sed 's/[", ]//g').zip . -x README.md -x package.json -x images/input.png -x "*.git*" -x "*.DS_Store*" -x images/screenshot.png
scripts.process-icons: cd images;convert input.png -resize 48x48 input-48.png;convert input.png -resize 32x32 input-32.png;convert input.png -resize 16x16 input-16.png;convert input.png -resize 64x64 input-64.png
